exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce HP to an evaluable reference.
The reference HP was not found in the current environment.
The reference k was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

In environment P : nat -> Prop f : nat -> nat Hf : forall n : nat, f n < f (S n) f_mono : forall x y : nat, x <= y -> f x <= f y f_smono : forall x y : nat, x < y -> f x < f y f_ge_n : forall n : nat, n <= f n n : nat H : forall n : nat, (exists k : nat, n = f k) -> P n H0 : forall n : nat, P n -> exists k : nat, n = f k Unable to unify "?M1886 <= f ?M1886" with "exists k : nat, n <= k /\\ P k".
The reference Hk was not found in the current environment.

original: intros. unfold HP in *. destruct (HP n) as [k Hk]. exists k. split. - apply f_ge_n. - apply Hk.
